name: Reea
tag_list: website, software, web, development, animation, mobile-application
overview:
REEA = Website & software development

Our programmers are fluent in many programming languages, continuously keeping up with the latest developments in their areas of expertise.

REEA = design, animation, TV, advertising, video/film

Our creative staff includes graphic artists, web designers, photographers, video editors and copywriters. They can turn your raw input into state-of-the-art visuals.

REEA = 140 professionals in an award-winning multi-platform agency established in 1998.

REEA = A well-priced creative solution for web design, programming and new media needs Mission Help, build, sometimes invest in start-ups and interested constantly to create new ones.

The company is a full service supplier for software and multimedia development, being able to cover requests ranging from programming to copywriting, video processing, 2D and 3D animation, advertising campaign creation, and print design.
